mapper.select: SELECT ireview_id AS ireviewId, ireview_name AS ireviewName, ireview_title AS ireviewTitle, ireview_text AS ireviewText, ireview_created_at AS ireviewCreatedAt FROM in_reviews ORDER BY ireview_id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO in_reviews ( ireview_name, ireview_password, ireview_title, ireview_text, ireview_created_at ) VALUES ( #{ireviewName}, #{ireviewPassword}, #{ireviewTitle}, #{ireviewText}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ) RETURNING ireview_id INTO #{ireviewId}
INSERT INTO in_photos ( iphoto_review_id, iphoto_url, iphoto_description ) VALUES ( #{iphotoReviewId}, #{iphotoUrl}, #{iphotoDescription} )
mapper.select: SELECT iphoto_id AS iphotoId, iphoto_review_id AS iphotoReviewId, iphoto_url AS iphotoUrl, iphoto_description AS iphotoDescription FROM in_photos WHERE iphoto_review_id = #{reviewId}

SELECT ireview_id AS ireviewId, ireview_name AS ireviewName, ireview_title AS ireviewTitle, ireview_text AS ireviewText, ireview_created_at AS ireviewCreatedAt FROM in_reviews WHERE ireview_id = #{reviewId}
